REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F RM f1624 reute r f BC-PHILADELPHIA-EXCHANGE 03-30 0069

TEXT.TITLE: PHILADELPHIA EXCHANGE SETS FAR EAST MARKETING
TEXT.BODY:
The <Philadelphia Stock Exchange> said it has established a Far East marketing division based in Hong Kong to try to broaden participation among international banks, multinational corporations and trading firms in its foreign currency options market. The exchange said the new division will shortly open a representative office in Tokyo.
Reuter
